channel.title: Gaming on goodroot
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on goodroot

item.title: Gaming Buddies
item.description: It was 13 years ago when Whitethumbs and I first met, waging virtual war late at night within a crowded voice chat server. We were both young. Myself, 13. Whitethumbs, 14. We both had a passion for competitive gaming. We made fast friends, as we were both goofy and talkative. Little did I know the impact this friendship would have on my life. After a night of gaming began to wind down, we decided we should exchange contact information to play again another night.
